bibl.title: Neoptolemus and the Paean-Cry: An Echo of a Sacred Aetiology in Pindar.
bibl.note: Pa. VI, 121-2; XXI; VIIc(c). The Pythoctonia-aetiology of the paean-cry is probably at least as old as the 5th century and may be presupposed in Pindar's Sixth Paean.
bibl.seg: RUTHERFORD Ian, Neoptolemus and the Paean-Cry: An Echo of a Sacred Aetiology in Pindar.
Pa. VI, 121-2; XXI; VIIc(c). The Pythoctonia-aetiology of the paean-cry is probably at least as old as the 5th century and may be presupposed in Pindar's Sixth Paean.
